messages.title: Yes to Europe. No to Climate Chaos

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Committed to take meaningful action on greenhouse gas emissions, and will work on an international level to do the same. Promotes local businesses and enterprises, help protect existing woodlands, and create new ones.
Improve broadband provision within West Norfolk.
Ensure every village is connected to its market town by a reliable and regular bus service so that nobody is isolated in our communities.

mentions.candidate: Dr Pallavi Devulapalli is a GP in Downham Market and lives in Shouldham. Involved in politics in a non-partisan way and was a founder member of the against the incinerator in King's Lynn. Founder, with others, of Downham and Villages in Transition, which aimed to raise awareness of climate and environmental crisis.

issues.environment: Promotes local businesses and enterprises, help protect existing woodlands, and create new ones.
issues.health: Dr Pallavi Devulapalli works as a GP in Downham Market

politicalExperience.achievements: Against the incinerator in King's Lynn, Downham and Villages in Transition.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Michael de Whalley on behalf of the West Norfolk Green Party, 5 Chequers Road, Grimston, King’s Lynn, Norfolk, PE32 1AJ.
